entry.title: Garland U Series - 60" Commercial Gas Range
entry.summary:
Vendor: Garland
Type: Commercial Range
Price: 5109.00 - 9278.00 (66 variants)

Garland's "U Series" covers an assortment of ranges with various widths and configurations. All Garland's commercial ranges are made in Canada and sought after for their premium construction and energy efficiency. 

The Garland U60-10RR is the base model of this width category. Its top configuration is ten open top burners with cast-iron grates. Other top configurations include a mixture of burners and different griddle sizes. There are three base configurations: two ovens; one oven and one storage base; or two storage bases. The griddles can be manual or thermostatic.

Generally speaking, the top, base, and construction of the 60" Garland "U Series" is identical to the 60" Garland "G Series". However, there is a small difference in the make of the oven. "U Series" ovens have a full porcelain interior, whereas "G Series" ovens only have a porcelain bottom. There is also a small difference of output. The "U Series" ovens have an output of 396,000 BTU whereas the "G Series" ovens have an output of 406,000 BTU.

      • Made in Canada
      • NSF approved
      • Can be ordered with multiple top and base configurations
      • Can be ordered with a manual or thermostatic griddle
      • Can be ordered with natural gas or liquid propane
      • Dimensions (WDH) 59" x 31.13" x 57"
      • Oven has a full porcelain interior
      • Stainless steel construction

OPTIONAL ACCESSORIES

entry.title: Garland X Series - 36" Commercial Gas Range
entry.summary:
Vendor: Garland
Type: Commercial Range
Price: 2074.00 - 3435.00 (8 variants)

Garland's "X Series" covers an assortment of ranges with various widths and configurations. All Garland commercial ranges are made in Canada and sought after for their premium construction and energy efficiency. 

The Garland X36-6R is the base model for this width category. The top configuration is six open burners. Another top configuration in this width is the Garland X36-2G24R: two open burners and a 24-inch griddle. You can order these ovens with a storage base or an oven. 

Generally speaking, the construction of the 36" Garland "X Series" is identical to the 36" Garland "G Series" and the 36" Garland "U Series". However, there is a small difference in the make of the oven. "G Series" ovens have a full porcelain interior, whereas "U Series" and "X Series" ovens only have a porcelain bottom and oven liner. There is also a small difference of output. The "X Series" ovens have an output of 213,000 BTU BTU, the "G Series" 236,000 BTU, and the "U Series" 230,000 BTU.

      • Made in Canada
      • NSF approved
      • Two top configurations: six open burners or two open burners and a 24 inch griddle
      • Two base configurations: oven or storage base
      • Natural gas or liquid propane
      • Dimensions (WDH) 35.5" x 31.13" x 57"
      • Oven has a porcelain bottom and door liner
      • Snap action thermostat with a low of 260° Celsius

entry.title: Imperial IR-10 - 60" Commercial Gas Range
entry.summary:
Vendor: Imperial
Type: Commercial Range
Price: 7785.00 - 8823.00 (4 variants)

The Imperial IR-10 is a 60" wide commercial gas range, which can be ordered for either natural gas or liquid propane. It has 10 open burners and two 26.5" wide ovens. Or can also be ordered with 6 open burners and a 24" griddle (model IR-6-G24).

The burners on this range have two rings of flame for even cooking, no matter the size of your pan. And its top grates have anti-clogging pilot shields to protect the pilot from grease and debris. It has a large, 5" stainless steel landing ledge for convenient plating. And the controls have a durable cast-aluminum with a vylox heat-protection grip.

Imperial has been making high quality, top value cooking equipment since 1957. They use innovative manufacturing processing with state-of-the-art technology and machinery to enhance efficiencies, lower production costs, and offer top quality equipment.

      • Made in the USA
      • "PyroCentric" 32,000 BTU anti-clogging burner with a 7,000 BTU/hr. low simmer feature. Two rings of flame for even heating
      • Burners are anti-clogging and lift-off and separate for easy cleaning. No gaskets or screws
      • One standing pilot per burner for instant ignition
      • Front grates measure 12" x 11." Back grates are 12" x 13"
      • Back grates are sized for positioning large stock pots directly over burner and feature a hot air dam
      • Pots slide easily from section to section and onto landing ledge
      • Grates are cast iron for a long service life

Do you have a kitchen that has to sustain a high volume of output on a consistent basis? With the Vulcan EV series, you don't have to sacrifice on quality to do so. It's a heavy duty model that lives up to Vulcan's legacy of quality construction and easy-to-use features.

The Vulcan 36" range is a sturdy model with a fully MIG welded frame; and, its front, sides, and lift-off high shelf are completely made of stainless steel. It's crumb tray is also stainless steel, and comes with welded corners.

The range top comes with a multitude of variations. The oven itself is standard, has a range of 200 - 500 degrees Fahrenheit, and comes with one rack and three positions.

      • 36" width
      • Fully MIG welded frame
      • Heavy duty construction
      • Infinite heat control switches
      • Requires 208, 240 or 480 volt, 1 or 3 phase power supply.
      • Ranges shipped in 3 phase and are field convertible to single phase

entry.title: Vulcan V Series - 12" Heavy Duty Commercial Gas Range Section
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vulcan
Type: Commercial Range
Price: 2827.00 - 4001.00 (12 variants)

This is the 12" section of the Vulcan V Series of heavy-duty, customizable ranges. You can order this range section in a variety of configurations, and then combine it with other V Series sections or matched equipment, to create a custom unit. The top configurations can be ordered as modular units (to be placed on a refrigerated chef base or a stand), or with a cabinet base.

The Vulcan V Series heavy duty ranges may be some of the most flexible, gas-powered ranges on the market. These sturdy, stainless steel machines are crafted to maximize performance, as well as give your kitchen an advanced visual aesthetic for display cooking.

The V Series ranges come outfitted with a stainless steel front, front top ledge, crumb tray, base, and stub back. The modular units come with 4" flanged feet you can rest upon a chef base or stand (sold separately). Griddles are available on both the left and right side of the oven as separate attachments.

For more information on the V series heavy duty ranges, check out Vulcan's brochure.

      • Stainless steel front, front top ledge, crumb tray, base and stub back
      • 1.25" front gas manifold
      • 1.25" rear gas connection (capped)
      • 4" stainless steel stub riser
      • Heavy duty cast grates and aeration bowls
      • 6" adjustable legs
      • 4" flanged feet for all modular top units
      • Stainless steel cabinet base doors and adjustable universal slides with stainless steel shelf for cabinet base models (no shelf or slides in 12" wide cabinet bases)
      • Griddles available left or right

VIDEO

VULCAN V SERIES

The V Series is Vulcan's fully customizable, heavy-duty range series. You can pick and choose different sections and add them side by side. There's a wide variety of oven tops and bases, as well as matched fryers, broilers, and more.

Please keep in mind that the configuration options will vary depending on the width of the section you're purchasing. For instance, the 48" section is only available as a modular item and as a charbroiler, whereas the 36" section is available as a single french-top, manual griddle, etc. and can be paired with a standard oven, convection oven, and so-on. If it's a modular item you're purchasing, it would be placed on either a refrigerated chef base or a stand.

V Series - Matched Fryer Equipment
